# visualCodeType

**Instance Property**

The type of visual code requested by the user.

## Declaration

```swift
var visualCodeType: INVisualCodeType { get }
```

## Getting the Visual Code Type

- **INVisualCodeType**: Constants indicating the purpose of the visual code.
